system.description: The magic inherently flowing through sorcerers allows them to manipulate spontaneously the effects of their spells more easily. Sorcerers can reduce the cost of a common Modifier (see @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc.JournalEntry.swadefcp04arcana.JournalEntryPage.04activation0000#power-modifiers]{Power Modifiers} in the Fantasy Companion) by 1 Power Point a number of times per day equal to their Rank (e.g., one for Novice, two for Seasoned, five for Legendary). This ability can be used only once per encounter.
